snippet: Authorities in London said seven members of the Royal Marines military unit had been arrested on suspicion of murder after “an engagement with an insurgent” in Afghanistan last year.
abstract: London authorities say seven members of the Royal Marines have been arrested on suspicion of murder after 'an engagement with an insurgent' in Afghanistan in 2011, apparently first time British service personnel have been held on such charges in more than a decade of war there.
lead_paragraph: Authorities in London said seven members of the Royal Marines military unit had been arrested on suspicion of murder after “an engagement with an insurgent” in Afghanistan last year.

headline.seo: 7 British Marines Investigated in Afghan Killing
headline.main: 7 British Marines Investigated in Afghan Killing
headline.print_headline: Britain: 7 Royal Marines Arrested Over 2011 Death in Afghanistan
